hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
if [ -z "$job_id" ] ; then # get last number api_url="http://admin:$admin_token@192.168.151.14:8080/job/$job_name_extra/api/json"
all_job=`curl -X GET $api_url` last_number=$(echo "${all_job}" | python -c "import json, sys; obj=json.load(sys.stdin); print obj['lastBuild']['number']") echo -e "\n\nlast number: $last_number\n\n"
job_id=$last_number fi
term_url="http://admin:$admin_token@192.168.151.14:8080/job/$job_name_extra/$job_id/term" check_url="http://admin:$admin_token@192.168.151.14:8080/job/$job_name_extra/$job_id/api/json"
# terminate time=0 while [ $time -lt 3 ]; do let "time++"
# check status first rst=$(curl -X GET $check_url | python -c "import json, sys; obj=json.load(sys.stdin); print obj['result']") echo -e "\ntime: $time, result=$rst\n"
# None means ongoing if [ "$rst" != "None" ]; then exit 0 fi
curl -X POST $term_url > /dev/null sleep 5s done
